Class HandCard

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.model.gamelogic.component.card.Card
ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.model.gamelogic.component.card.HandCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NumeralCard, SpecialCard
public abstract class HandCard
extends Card
Abstract class of Handcards All Handcards can be in a players hand Handcards have a unique id
